rooms.description: An open-plan living and kitchen area designed in contemporary style with ample natural light, Vastu-aligned orientation for prosperity and positive energy.
A dedicated library space optimized for quiet study and leisure reading. Positioned to benefit from a serene view, following Vastu principles for knowledge and mental balance.
The master bedroom designed with ample storage, in keeping with modern comfort and privacy requirements, oriented according to Vastu for restful sleep.
A spacious bedroom designed for a family member or guest, with modern interior finishes and proper Vastu alignment for personal growth.
Another well-lit bedroom intended for additional occupancy. Its design respects both contemporary aesthetics and traditional Vastu guidelines.
An ensuite bathroom designed with modern fixtures ensuring privacy and efficiency, with attention to Vastu directions for water usage.

openings.description: Large front entrance door oriented in the north-east direction to invite positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Multiple strategically placed windows that ensure natural light and proper ventilation throughout the house, aligning with sustainable design practices.

levels.note: The floor plan is designed within a total area of 1800 sqft on a single level (penthouse bungalow) ensuring an open-plan kitchen-living area integrated seamlessly with contemporary design and adherence to Vastu principles. All areas are allocated accordingly to maximize utility, aesthetics, and energy flow.
